QuestData.Title: The Blessing of Zim'Torga
QuestData.Description: Hexxer Ubungo probably told you about making offerings to the gods of Zul'Drak. Zim'Abwa is not the only god that stands forgotten by the Drakkari.$B$BWe have taken refuge within the presence of Zim'Torga, the Mother of Prosperity. As with Zim'Abwa, if you were to give offerings of the Drakkari to her, she is sure to give you her blessing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Witch Doctor Khufu wants you to present 10 Drakkari Offerings to the statue of Zim'Torga.
QuestData.CompletionText: <You can feel the eyes of the Mother of Prosperity upon you. She is wondering what a $r such as yourself is doing standing before her.>
QuestData.RewardText: <Zim'Torga's thoughts pervade your own. She senses the offerings you are about to give to her and is pleased.>$B$B<She conveys that you will be appropriately rewarded.>
